entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Churchill Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -21.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Churchill Falls 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -21.9°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -25.2°C
Wind: WNW 26 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023
